articles.title: Best Chunking Strategies for RAG in 2025
articles.description: Compare six chunking strategies for RAG systems using real benchmark data from NVIDIA and Chroma. Learn when to use recursive splitting, semantic chunking, page-level chunking, and LLM-based approaches with practical code examples and honest trade-offs.
articles.author: Bex Tuychiev

articles.title: Best Vector Databases in 2025: A Complete Comparison Guide
articles.description: Compare 14 major vector databases with real performance benchmarks, honest trade-offs, and decision frameworks. Learn which database fits your RAG application based on scale, infrastructure, and use caseâ€”from Pinecone and Milvus to pgvector and Weaviate.
articles.author: Bex Tuychiev

articles.title: 10 Essential Python Libraries Every Data Analyst Should Know
articles.description: Learn the 10 Python libraries for data analytics that power data extraction, analysis, visualization, machine learning, and dashboards, each with a practical code example.
articles.author: Abid Ali Awan

articles.title: Stop Getting Blocked: 10 Common Web-Scraping Mistakes & Easy Fixes
articles.description: Avoid these 10 critical web scraping mistakes that cause 403 errors and blocked IPs. Get practical fixes for JavaScript handling, anti-bot detection, and rate limiting.
articles.author: Bex Tuychiev

articles.title: 10 AI Projects You Can Build with Firecrawl Now
articles.description: Build 10 AI projects with Firecrawl's web scraping API: RAG systems, AI agents, price trackers, and more. Includes step-by-step tutorials, GitHub repos, and deployment guides for beginner to advanced developers.
articles.author: Abid Ali Awan

articles.title: Mastering Firecrawl Search Endpoint: Web Search and Data Extraction in One API Call
articles.description: Learn how to use Firecrawl's search endpoint to combine web search and content extraction in a single API call. This guide covers basic and advanced usage, filtering, and building search-powered applications.
articles.author: Bex Tuychiev

articles.title: 11 AI Agent Projects You Can Build Today (With Guides)
articles.description: Build AI agents that reason, plan, act, and use tools to deliver results, from no/low-code platforms to advanced multi agent framework.
articles.author: Abid Ali Awan

articles.title: Web Scraping for Beginners: A Step-by-Step Guide
articles.description: Learn how to collect data from websites using Python in this beginner's guide.
articles.author: Bex Tuychiev

articles.title: The Complete Guide to Web Search APIs for AI Applications in 2025
articles.description: Discover the best web search APIs for 2025. Compare features, pricing, and capabilities to find the web search API for your application.
articles.author: Dania Durnas

articles.title: How to Use Firecrawl's Scrape API: Complete Web Scraping Tutorial
articles.description: Learn how to scrape websites using Firecrawl's /scrape endpoint. Master JavaScript rendering, structured data extraction, and batch operations with Python code examples.
articles.author: Bex Tuychiev

articles.title: Mastering Firecrawl's Crawl Endpoint: A Complete Web Scraping Guide
articles.description: Learn how to use Firecrawl's crawl method for efficient web scraping. Master URL control, performance tuning, and integration with LangChain for AI-powered data extraction.
articles.author: Bex Tuychiev

articles.title: Fine-Tune OpenAI GPT-OSS 20B on the Dermatology Dataset
articles.description: Learn how to fine-tune OpenAI's GPT-OSS 20B on a dermatology Q&A dataset created with the Firecrawl web search API, with a step-by-step workflow from setup to training, evaluation, and inference.
articles.author: Abid Ali Awan

articles.title: How to Generate a Sitemap Using Firecrawl's /map Endpoint: A Complete Guide
articles.description: Learn how to generate XML and visual sitemaps using Firecrawl's /map endpoint. Step-by-step guide with Python code examples, performance comparisons, and interactive visualization techniques for effective website mapping.
articles.author: Bex Tuychiev

articles.title: Why Firecrawl Beats Octoparse for AI Web Scraping
articles.description: Compare web scraping tools for AI developers. Firecrawl's Fire Engine outperforms Octoparse with superior dynamic content handling, API-first design, and LLM-ready outputs.
articles.author: Eric Ciarla

articles.title: We just raised our Series A and shipped /v2
